messages.default: Something went wrong on the dancefloor!

descriptions.400: Yo, that request was off-beat. Try syncing up with the rhythm!
descriptions.401: This VIP section needs a wristband, fam. You're not on the list yet!
descriptions.402: Cover charge required! Can't shuffle without paying the DJ.
descriptions.403: Sorry, this area is restricted to crew only. No backstage passes here!
descriptions.404: Sorry, I got a little carried away while shuffling things around over here...
descriptions.405: That move doesn't work on this floor. Try a different dance style!
descriptions.406: The format you requested isn't compatible with our playlist, homie.
descriptions.408: Your connection dropped the beat. Took too long to respond!
descriptions.409: Two DJs trying to play at once? We got a mix conflict!
descriptions.410: That track was deleted from the playlist. It's gone forever.
descriptions.413: Whoa, your file size is too thicc for the dancefloor! Compress that!
descriptions.429: Slow down! You're requesting songs faster than the DJ can mix!
descriptions.500: The whole system just glitched out. Even the DJ is confused.
descriptions.502: The gateway to the main stage is broken. Sound check failed!
descriptions.503: The club is closed for maintenance. Come back after the cleanup crew is done!
descriptions.504: The connection to the main speakers timed out. No sound!
descriptions.default: Sorry, I got a little carried away while shuffling things around over here...
